title: BRIEF-Tenneco Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.33
text:
February 9, 2018 / 1:07 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Tenneco Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.33 Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Tenneco Inc: 
* TENNECO REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.33 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $2.391 BILLION 
* EXPECTS CONSTANT DOLLAR TOTAL REVENUE GROWTH OF 3% IN THE FIRST QUARTER 2018 
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES BETWEEN $380 MILLION AND $410 MILLION 
* ‍IN 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS 5% ORGANIC GROWTH, OUTPACING INDUSTRY PRODUCTION BY 3 PERCENTAGE POINTS 
* ‍IN 2019 AND 2020, TENNECO EXPECTS REVENUE GROWTH WILL CONTINUE TO OUTPACE INDUSTRY PRODUCTION​ 
* ‍EXPECTS ORGANIC GROWTH OF 6% - 8% IN 2019, AND 5% - 7% IN 2020​ * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.89 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.64, REVENUE VIEW $2.30 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
